revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pinkan Mountain |image = [[File:Pinkan Mountain.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Pinkan Mountain. |tokens = 86,500 |location = Pinkan Island, between Pinkan Plains and Pinkan Forest. }} '''Pinkan Mountain''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 1,503,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Pinkan Rattata.png|40px]] Pinkan Rattata|| colspan=2 rowspan=5| <center> N/A |- | [[File:Pinkan Nidoran(M).png|40px]] Pinkan Nidoran(M) |- | [[File:Pinkan Nidoran(F).png|40px]] Pinkan Nidoran(F) |- | [[File:Pinkan Mankey.png|40px]] Pinkan Mankey |- | [[File:Pinkan Rhyhorn.png|40px]] Pinkan Rhyhorn |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Pinkan Primeape.png|40px]] Pinkan Primeape|| rowspan=3|<center> 7,000,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Pinkan Rhydon.png|40px]] Pinkan Rhydon |- | [[File:Pinkan Nidoking.png|40px]] Pinkan Nidoking |}
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="No Debuff"> '''*Note:''' [[Pink Shard]] is a Rare drop in this dungeon. However, due to it needing the player to have reached [[Kalos]] first, it won't drop without the debuff being applied to it. Check the Debuff tab for more details. {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Pecha}} || 6 || 49.98% || 48.00% || 40.00% |- | {{Bag2|Persim}} || N/A || 8.33% || 8.00% || 6.67% |- | {{Bag2|Nanab}} || N/A || 8.33% || 8.00% || 6.67% |- | {{Bag2|Mago}} || N/A || 8.33% || 8.00% || 6.67% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 20.00% || 21.00% || 24.94% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | {{Bag2|Qualot}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | {{Bag2|Magost}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | {{Bag2|Watmel}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.50% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Pink Bow}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.59% || 3.99% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.22% || 1.06% |} </tab> <tab name="Debuff">
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears !! Requirement |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Pecha}} || 6 || 50.00% || 50.00% || 50.00% || rowspan=4|<center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Persim}} || N/A || 8.33% || 8.33% || 8.33% |- | {{Bag2|Nanab}} || N/A || 8.33% || 8.33% || 8.33% |- | {{Bag2|Mago}} || N/A || 8.33% || 8.33% || 8.33% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Purple Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% || <center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Pink Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% || Have reached [[Kalos]] |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Mind Plate}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% || rowspan=4| <center>N/A |- | {{Bag2|Qualot}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | {{Bag2|Magost}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | {{Bag2|Watmel}} || N/A || 0.22% || 0.22% || 0.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Pink Bow}} || N/A || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% || <center>N/A |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% || <center>N/A |} </tab> </tabs>
